entry.title: John McGinn claims he spoke to Celtic players about manager
entry.summary: Most Celtic fans will remember how the club missed out on the opportunity to sign John McGinn some years back. entry.title: Celtic legend takes dig at Rangers player for diving
entry.summary: After Celtic drew 1-1 against Motherwell, the Rangers were handed a major chance to get back into the title race.
